questions.subheading: Users can sign in with their Nexus credentials and maintain single sign-on across the platform.

questions.text: Users can access their Account information using the account dropdown
questions.subheading: A user menu or dropdown in the header allows quick access to profile settings, preferences, and account management.

questions.text: Has consistent navigation patterns throughout the application
questions.subheading: Whether the main navigation is at the top of the app, in a drawer on the left-hand side, or in a hamburger menu, it is consistent. Main navigation is NOT needed on second level pages if there is a back button.

questions.text: Application settings are easily accessible to users
questions.subheading: Users can find and modify application preferences, display options, and configuration settings without difficulty.

questions.text: Help and support resources are readily available
